frw.common.delete.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {{param}}?

frw.addChainDialog.title: Add chain
frw.addChainDialog.name: Name
frw.addChainDialog.errorNameMustStartWithCharacters: Name must start with one of the characters A-Z, a-z, _
frw.addChainDialog.errorNameMayContainCharacters: Name may contain the characters A-Z, a-z, 0-9, -, _

frw.configStartPage.storeHint: Note that all changes are applied immediately. To apply the changes persistently, click the 'Save firewall configuration' button.
frw.configStartPage.inputFilter.title: Input filter
frw.configStartPage.inputFilter.description: Filter incoming packets that address this device
frw.configStartPage.forwardFilter.title: Forward filter
frw.configStartPage.forwardFilter.description: Filter incoming packets that address other targets and pass this device
frw.configStartPage.outputFilter.title: Output filter
frw.configStartPage.outputFilter.description: Filter outgoing packets created by this device
frw.configStartPage.destinationNat.title: Destination NAT
frw.configStartPage.sourceNat.title: Source NAT

frw.chainList.name: Name
frw.chainList.deleteChain.title: Delete chain
frw.chainList.addItemInfoTextInput: Filter incoming network packets that address this device
frw.chainList.addItemInfoTextOutput: Filter outgoing network packets created by this device
frw.chainList.addItemInfoTextForward: Filter incoming network packets that address other targets and are routed through this device
frw.chainList.addItemInfoTextPrerouting: Destination NAT replaces the destination address of network packets with the address of the actual recipient.
frw.chainList.addItemInfoTextPostrouting: Source NAT replaces the source address of network packets with the address of this device.

frw.chainPage.name: Name
frw.chainPage.acceptHint: If you are creating a chain with default policy "Accept", your rules should reject or drop matching packets.
frw.chainPage.dropHint: If you are creating a chain with default policy "Drop", your rules should accept matching packets.
frw.chainPage.reorderRulesHint: To reorder rules, drag & drop the corresponding rows
frw.chainPage.errorNameMustStartWithCharacters: Name must start with one of the characters A-Z, a-z, _
frw.chainPage.errorNameMayContainCharacters: Name may contain the characters A-Z, a-z, 0-9, -, _
frw.chainPage.deleteRule.title: Delete rule
frw.chainPage.selectDropPolicy.title: Select 'Drop' default policy
frw.chainPage.refuseSelectDropPolicyMsg: This chain currently does not contain any rule with an 'Accept' action. By switching the default policy to 'Drop', the system would no longer be reachable. The default policy will not be changed.
frw.chainPage.selectDropPolicy.confirmation: Are you sure you want to select 'Drop' as default policy? If the rules are not configured properly the system might no longer be reachable afterwards

frw.ruleEditorDialog.title: Rule
frw.ruleEditorDialog.name: Name
frw.ruleEditorDialog.reorderExpressionsHint: To reorder expressions, drag & drop the corresponding rows
frw.ruleEditorDialog.errorNameMayContainCharacters: Name may contain the characters A-Z, a-z, 0-9, -, _ and spaces between them
frw.ruleEditorDialog.minExpressionWarning: A rule must contain at least one expression.
frw.ruleEditorDialog.errorCommentMayNotContainCharacters: Comment may not contain the following characters: '\[]{}'

frw.canLeaveAppGuard.title: Unsaved changes on firewall configuration
frw.canLeaveAppGuard.description: You made changes to the firewall configuration. You can save your changes, discard your changes or cancel to continue editing.

frw.notification.errorMissingPermissions: You do not have the required permissions.
